body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 5K UHD 3 Ways Triple Dashcam, Dash Camera for Cars with 5G WiFi & GPS, 3.99" Touch Screen, Night Vision, Loop Recording, Parking Monitoring, Free 64GB Card
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
features: [2024 Technology Upgrades] The dashcam can have the simultaneous transmission screen of the front, rear and inner cameras, you just need to tap the screen to switch different footage.

[3 Channel Dash Cam] This car recorder provides a complete view of your car with its ultra-wide-angle cameras of 170° (front cam), 150° (interior cam), and 150° (rear cam), which can simultaneously monitor the front, inside, and rear of your vehicle. The 4K( 3840*2160P) + 1080P + 1080P UHD quality records every detail of your driving trip, providing you with solid evidence in accident disputes.

[3.99" Touch Screen] Different from conventional "button operation" dash cams, this car camera is equipped with a full touch screen, which allows you to easily operate settings/menu functions without cumbersome buttons. And it also retain the original physical buttons.

[Built-in GPS] With built-in GPS, this smart dash cam accurately records your speed and coordinate. You can download a special player on your computer to check all drive information such as Time, Location, Speed, and so on.

[Built-in 5G WiFi] The WiFi connectivity allows you to connect the dashcam to your smartphone APP. Use the dedicated App to live view dash cam recordings on your iOS and android devices. And you are able to download the car road videos directly to your phone and then easily share them with friends and family on social media.The download speed of 5G WiFi is four times faster than 2.4G WiFi.

[Superior Night Vision] The car dashboard camera can shoot clear images even in low-light conditions or at night, which will capture more detail evidence and restore the actual scene to the greatest extent, and protect your legitimate rights and interests.

[Loop Recording] In “Loop Recording” setting, you can choose 1min, 3min or 5min to record. It come with a free 64G card, you don’t need to worry about the memory card being filled up , this dash cam will automatically overwrite the oldest videos to free up the storage.

[24 Hours Parking Guard] To achieve this function, an extra car accessory- hardwire kit is required ( not included in the package). This dash cams for cars will auto-switch to parking mode after your car is off. Using a vehicle batteries for Time-Lapse Recording keeps recording continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate. Provides around-the-clock protection to your cars.

[1-Year-Warranty + Worry-Free Customer Service ] We provide a 12-month warranty for the host and accessories. We have a professional customer service team to provide 24/7 service to provide you with timely and professional after-sales support.
